You and Max are both in the Northern Arizona University Alumni Association group

Y Scouts purpose - Transforming how people and companies connect to work that matters.In that time, we’ve moved the conversation around purpose and its importance in leadership and recruiting to the forefront in the boardrooms of some of the most respected companies and nonprofits across the country.How we deliver is simple–and totally unique–in the search industry: we connect the most purpose-aligned, proven leaders to growing organizations with missions and cultures that matter.Y Scouts is the leading executive search and strategy company that purpose-based organizations turn to for finding and hiring deeply aligned, high-performing, exceptional leaders that multiply their teams.Our team has years of deep experience in recruiting and leadership development.We believe that the most transformational, impact-oriented leaders are found through a shared purpose with the hiring organization. Period.

Job Brokers, Inc. specializes in providing high quality human capital. We offer a full range of recruiting services including: Retained search, executive search, contingent search, contract, contract to hire, direct placement and a full array of research recruitment and market intelligence information gathering. Job Brokers is the parent company to JBI Technical and JBI Green.
Northern Arizona University-The W. A. Franke College of Business

Adam Goodman
CEO at Goodmans Interior Structures
October 20, 2013, Adam was a client of Max’s

I hired Max and Y Scouts to recruit a new CFO and was delighted with the process and results. Max and his team went above and beyond to understand our company and culture, including attending internal company meetings, reading  through volumes of background documents and spending hours interviewing our leadership team. Throughout the process, Max stayed engaged and regularly checked in to confirm that I was comfortable with the process. I highly recommend Max and the entire Y Scouts team to any company who appreciates the importance of a candidate's cultural fit. Other recruiting firms can also do a great job of finding a talented candidate with the requisite skills, but only Y Scouts has a diagnostic process to determine if the candidate will fit the culture.

Ryan Abbott
Director of Domestic Operations at AGL Supply Chain
August 17, 2011, Ryan was a client of Max’s

Max and I have been friends for more than ten years.  Being friends, I obviously was aware of the work he performed and the services his company offered, but never had the need for those services until recently… My department was in need of 3-4 people to help with a systems integration project and with the potential to transition these people into different roles once the project was complete. I first addressed the need with my HR Dept and the director ensured me that she was capable of addressing these needs.  After more than two weeks my HR Dept had yet to identify even one qualified applicant.  With the project starting in just a few days I decided to call in some re-enforcements.  I contacted Max and provided as much information as I could to help him and his company in fulfilling our needs.  Max and his team tackled the project with confidence and a positive attitude.  The next day Max informed me that he had 4 qualified people all able to start @ 8am on Monday morning.  I was skeptical, but Max assured me that I would be satisfied with the level of talent these people possessed.  Sure enough, at 7:30am on Monday morning all 4 people reported to duty, accompanied by Max.  Each of the people performed above expectations and we ended up offering full time employment to each of them.  I have since employed Max's services two more times and have been 100% satisfied each time.  Thanks Max!
Ryan Abbott

summary: I feel incredibly proud to be part of the Purpose movement and Founding member of the Y Scouts team.  We have the privilege of providing the most impactful part of any organization – Performance Proven and Purpose Aligned Leaders!  Talent and Exceptional Leadership is the only real competitive advantage in business. Our Leadership search process not only yields the best leaders on earth, but, it allows our clients to better their internal hiring processes along the way.If traditional recruiting is effective treatment for open roles in an organization,  Y Scouts would be considered a cure for better our clients hiring practices.  We continue to evolve proven processes that effectively align purpose, values, and professional competencies.  All of which is built on a proprietary leadership model which consists of 3 behaviors.  Relentless learner, driver of results, and developer or people.Specialties: Executive and Leadership SearchRPO/MSP'sTechnical RecruitingStarting Staffing CompaniesRapid Business GrowthProductivity Metrics for RecruitingSocial Networking
name: Max Hansen
title: CEO at Y Scouts - Purpose-based Leadership Search and Alignment
